item.title: Something Fun: WarriorJS
item.description:
Today’s post is a bit different from my usual content on best practices and tips. I wanted to share a fun game that I’ve been playing in the past called WarriorJS. I’ve shared this with many friends and clients over the last few years and it’s always been a hit.

This game is a fun way to learn JavaScript and programming concepts in a gamified environment. You play as a warrior climbing a tower, battling enemies, and collecting treasure. The twist? You write JavaScript code to control your warrior’s actions. The core mechanic is that you must write the logic for one “turn” at a time. You must sense your surroundings and make decisions based on the information available to you.
